scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:netlify: npm run install:all && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.copy-functions: mkdir -p netlify/functions && cp -r backend/src/app/api/* netlify/functions/ || echo 'Functions copied'
